title: Interpretation of a dream about an old house collapsing in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about the fall of an old house in a dream We may want to know the interpretation of a dream about the fall of an old house in a dream, which is one of the very disturbing dreams, so they are looking for an interpretation of this dream, but the reader must also forbid absolute disbelief because it is from the jurisprudence of some scholars who seek to reach the truth that they can make mistakes and can be contaminated, in addition to the fact that the site and those in charge of it have nothing to do with it. In the interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about the collapse of an old house in a dream If in my personal opinion an old house has fallen and collapsed, this may indicate some problems and concerns that the dreamer suffers from in his life and that they will end soon. The collapse of an old house in a dream may indicate the end of a difficult period for the dreamer. A person's dream of the collapse of an old house may indicate some disturbances that occurred in his life during those days. It is possible that seeing the collapse of an old house in a dream indicates abandonment of obedience and disobedience, and the dreamer must repent and draw closer to God Almighty. Interpretation of a dream about the collapse of a neighbor's building in a dream If you see the collapse of a neighbor's building, this may indicate a crisis that the neighbors may be exposed to during this time, and God knows best. We find that the collapse of a neighbor's building in a dream can indicate some problems and crises that this family is suffering from, and God knows best. In the event that he sees his neighbor's house falling from it, the walls may indicate a financial crisis that the neighbors may be exposed to during this period. And the collapse of a neighbor's house in a dream may indicate the coming of sorrows to the owners of the house, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about oil falling on the ground in a dream If you see oil falling on the ground, this may indicate what happened after the disturbances that occurred in life The dreamer during those days. Whoever dreams of oil falling to the ground may indicate that he was going through a financial crisis at that time, and God knows best. Seeing oil falling to the ground may indicate disturbances and financial crises that the dreamer may suffer from in those days. A person’s dream that oil fell to the ground may indicate changes in his life for the worse. He must ask God for help. Interpretation of a dream about a corpse falling from the sky in a dream If one sees that his body has fallen from the sky, this may indicate a problem that the dreamer has fallen into during this period, and God knows best. His body falling from the sky may indicate a disaster and troubles that the dreamer may suffer from in those days. If one sees a corpse falling from the sky, this may indicate the pollution and competition that occurred to the visions during this time. If one sees that there is a body falling from the sky, this may indicate the occurrence of some disturbances in the dreamer's life in those days, and God knows best. title: Interpretation of a dream about kissing the head of state in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about kissing the head of state in a dream. We will present below the interpretation of a dream about kissing the head of state in a dream according to what scholars have mentioned and not personal interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about kissing the head of state in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about kissing the head of state in a dream. We did not find specific interpretations for seeing the president kissing, except that seeing a good ruler may represent The upright judge and father, and God knows best. When you see an unjust ruler, it may express exposure to injustice, and God knows the unseen. Also, seeing the president in a dream can indicate happiness and closeness to God, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about my husband becoming a head of state in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my husband becoming a head of state in a dream. To be evidence of his attaining a high position, and God knows best. When the dreamer sees someone becoming a head of state in a dream, this may be an indication of a high position, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If the dreamer sees himself as a president, this may be a sign of goodness and reaching the position, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. I dreamed that my father became A president in a dream: I dreamed that my father became a president in a dream, and we did not find specific interpretations to see that. However, seeing that you become a president in a dream could be an indication of a high position, and God knows the unseen, as it may be evidence of reaching a prestigious position, and God knows best. In the event that a married woman sees a person He becomes president, and this may be a sign of his reaching a high position, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about seeing the president’s son in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about seeing the president’s son in a dream. Seeing the ruler’s son could indicate dignity and prestige, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees the ruler’s son, good-looking, it may indicate Glory and prestige, and God knows best. Seeing the ruler’s son sitting in a dream may indicate his high status, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about the head of state giving me money in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about the head of state giving me money in a dream. Seeing the ruler giving me money could mean kindness, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees the ruler giving money, he may He resorts to blessings, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees that the ruler is giving money, this may be an indication of a good future, God willing. If an unmarried girl sees the ruler giving her her money, this may indicate a happy future, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about seeing the wife of the head of state in a dream. Interpretation of a dream Seeing the wife of the head of state in a dream could be an indication of a strong personality, and God knows the unseen. When the dreamer sees the president’s wife, he may resort to a leadership figure, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees the king’s wife, this may indicate wisdom and the ability to make a decision, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of dreams is that The president’s wife in a dream. Interpretation of a dream that I am a president’s wife in a dream could be a reference to a high position, and God knows best. If a married woman dreams of marrying the president, this may indicate the position she will reach, and God knows the unseen. When she sees one girl marrying a president, perhaps this expresses her status. Al-Rafi’ah, and God knows best, the interpretation of a dream about marrying an employee in A

title: The 150 most important interpretations of visiting the dead in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: What are the most important interpretations of visiting the dead in a dream? Seeing a visit to the dead in a dream can be auspicious or disgusting, depending on the form of the dead and what conversation took place between him and the dreamer and whether he was angry or happy, all these details will be presented in full on the Egyptian site, as we present the most important things that Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi and other scholars said about this vision, so follow the following paragraphs. Visiting the dead in a dream This dream is very accurate and contains dozens of sub-dreams that carry their own interpretations. We will divide these dreams into two sections to facilitate finding the desired interpretation: What are the praiseworthy visions of visiting the dead in a dream and their most prominent interpretations? The first vision: He said Al-Nabulsi dreaming of visiting the dead is promising, even if the dreamer was a prisoner in something in his wakefulness and saw that his dead father visited him, the scene has a strong indication at the end of the prison term and obtain freedom soon. The second vision: The oppressed dreamer is alert, if he sees a dead person visiting him in a dream and telling him that God will support him, then the words of the dead person are true in the dream, meaning those who died while they were faithful and obedient to God and practiced it completely. It has religious rituals, and therefore the dream in it is a positive sign that God will soon restore his right to them who will be wronged. The third vision: A sad fortune teller in his life and feels serious difficulties in his financial, professional and family circumstances, if he sees one of the dead in his dream, and this dead person was laughing and his clothes were pure white and the dreamer felt warm and safe in the dream, the scene is good and indicates pleasure in coming to the seer. What are the most important innocent visions of visiting the dead in a dream? The first vision: If the deceased who visited the dreamer in his sleep was one of his relatives such as a father or mother, knowing that the time in which the dreamer saw the vision was very difficult due to the many problems he was facing in reality. Interpretation: The scene indicates the confusion that the dreamer feels due to the loss of this person and at the present time he feels lonely and unable to choose solutions that suit the problems he faces because he does not have guidance and advice, and therefore the dream describes the bad condition that the dreamer is living in at the present time. The second vision: If the dreamer lost his friend, he was recently awake and had a dream that that friend He was visiting him in a dream. Interpretation: The scene shows the dreamer's deep sadness over the death of his friend, and this dream plays an important role in the psychological factor, because due to the fortuneteller's intense longing for this person, he saw him in a dream, and from it. Here they confirm that dreams have a major role in satisfying human desires that cannot be achieved in waking life. The third vision: The dreamer may dream that someone from the deceased grandparents visited him in a dream and he was happy with this visit and eager to see them. Interpretation: The dream says that the dreamer anticipates the time when his grandparents lived, he felt that the present is harsher than the past and full of psychological, professional and material pressures. The fourth vision: He sees the disobedient person while awake and committing

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a paper in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a Malay in a dream indicates many events, some of which are evidence of good events and some of which are bad, and as we know, a Malay spreads out on the bed to have a beautiful appearance. Various other types with beautiful happy shapes, the interpretation of Malaysian dreams for a pregnant woman, a woman, a single woman, and a pregnant woman varies.Interpretation of a card dream by Ibn SirinSeeing Malay in dreams indicates a good wife.Interpretation of slugs in a dream is one of the visions that indicate comfort and stability in the dreamer’s life However, seeing a Malaysian burglary in a dream indicates competition and problems with a relative. Seeing men selling stomachs indicates separation and may mean divorce between spouses and the end of relationships. Colored papers in a dream indicate a new home. Interpretation of a dream about a sheet for a single woman: Seeing yourself receiving a piece of cotton is considered a gift. It indicates marriage or engagement soon, especially if it is green in color and soft to the touch. Seeing a green leaf can be a sign of happiness when living with your future husband. Seeing buying silk indicates the fulfillment of desires and goals. Interpretation of a married woman’s dream: Having a piece of cotton on the bed in The dream is a sign of a happy married life. Seeing a paper with a beautiful shape is a sign of the source of livelihood and favor that you will obtain. A married woman dreaming of a beautiful, clean white cover is evidence of the happy life that she and her husband live. A torn paper in a dream indicates the presence of problems and some problems. Seeing the sheets of a divorced family clean, this indicates that the husband will return again and settle down. Interpretation of a dream about a leaf for a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman sees a clean sheet, it indicates the date of birth. The white sheet approach suggests ease of labor and the baby. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a sheet for a man: Seeing a sheet in a dream is Good news for marriage to a woman with good morals. A dream about a white sheet is evidence of marriage to a beautiful girl. A dirty card is evidence of an unhappy life you are living. A dirty and torn sheet is an indication of marital disputes that sometimes lead to separation. A vision of selling bedding indicates In a dream, to a man’s source of livelihood. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a bedsheet for a divorced woman: A divorced woman sees in her dream a clean, consistent bed sheet in beautiful colors. This vision shows that she returned to her husband and lived a happy life with him, and it also shows her marriage to another man. Interpretation of buying sheets in a dream Sheets in a dream are interpreted by women as a single bed or case that indicates the presence of a woman and several beds that indicate polygamy. Good bedding and softness indicate a woman’s beauty, obedience, and love for her husband. If the bedding or sheet has a defect or deficiency, this indicates the wife’s bad behavior. Buying a new sheet or a new bed indicates a new wife, that is, a second wife. Selling an old bed indicates the wife’s divorce First: Interpretation of new leaves in a dream. Linens or linens indicate a woman to a man as a wife or a servant. If the young man’s opinion in bed is

title: Interpretation of worms in a pregnant woman's dream

preview.html: Seeing worms in the dream of a pregnant woman, married woman, divorced woman, or unmarried girl. Dreaming of white worms in bed. Eating white worms on dates in a mango. Worms coming out of the chest, from the leg, from the vaginal opening. By Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq, and others. There are some visions and dreams that have not been interpreted, but they are in reality. It has a meaning that one must know in order to preach, but some of the interpreters in the book have come up with some different interpretations for each interpretation and vision of a dream, but they all agree on the general meaning and content of the interpretation of the visions. As the visions are usually from Almighty God and they are right before the dawn prayer. After the dawn prayer, the dream is from Satan, and often the dream does not come true because it is a lie from Satan, but it is necessary to know the interpretation of seeing worms in a dream because worms are annoying insects, so some people wonder about the interpretation of seeing worms because it is something that really bothers them. Interpretation of worms in a dream for a pregnant womanThe vision of a pregnant woman Being infected with worms in a dream is something worthy of praise, as most translators and scholars have said, as it is said that seeing it is good news for her safety and the safety of her fetus. Whoever dreams of seeing worms in a specific area in the apartment during marriage, this indicates the presence of a relative or neighbor who does not want you to coexist with worms in her dream. If she is divorced, this indicates that there are people who do not want to reconcile her with your husband. And whoever sees worms in her dream while she is alone, this indicates the presence of a member of your family who does not want you to live your life. Interpretation of worms in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says that worms in a dream indicate more than Interpretation, but the general interpretation of worms is that it is envy and malice from some people who live around you, but there are certain situations in which worms are interpreted in a different way. If the lady of the house sees worms in the place of her kitchen, this indicates the presence of another woman who wants to do some magic in that place. .

title: Interpretation of a dream about an iron ladder and a wooden ladder in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing iron and wooden ladders in a dream for a single woman, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, for a man, climbing the steps of a wooden ladder, descending an iron ladder and falling from it, or breaking a wooden ladder according to Ibn Sirin and others. An iron ladder in a dream. One of the relatively strange dreams that we see in our dreams and they carry for us many important meanings and associations that every person must know correctly, as iron stairs are among the things that abound in our homes in order to obtain complete safety through these, and there are many different shapes and colors. Where we will explain to you the interpretation of seeing the iron gate as interpreted by the famous translator Ibn Sirin in his interpretations. Interpretation of the iron staircase in a dream: A wooden or metal ladder is a means that a person uses to climb places that do not contain stairs or that cannot be climbed easily, or to repair the house from the inside up to its roof. And its high walls. Sick health for men and women, whether they are married, married or separated in a dream. A wooden ladder in a dream indicates the holder of position, power and status, but he is a hypocrite and deceiver or unjust and unjust. It also indicates position and travel or health, prosperity and illness. Whoever sees himself climbing a wooden or metal ladder, this indicates However, he built a house or built a house, and it is said that whoever is looking for work in his life, his vision of climbing a wooden ladder indicates the help of a hypocrite. Or an unjust person or a tyrant in a high position, or a deceiver and a hypocrite. As for someone who goes up to look at the top of the stairs, this indicates travel, but if he goes up to hear the voice of people or them talking, or see their homes or secrets, or he is a spy and astonished, whether he knows it or not, permission. It indicates that he will be promoted at work and he will obtain position, honor, and money. Whoever sees himself standing at the top of the stairs, this indicates that he is a person who follows his curiosity to eavesdrop and listen to conversations from people that do not interest him, or he listens to spy on others in order to benefit from it. Or obtaining an interest without his right, and seeing a ladder lying on the ground means illness and brokenness. It is death on earth, and whoever raises it or takes it and locks it up, if he is sick, he will be cured because his erection indicates health, and for someone who is not sick, it is better. Other interpreters have been told that descending the ladder into a hole means death or calamity, and exiting the hole with a wooden ladder means comfort, happiness, and goodness. Interpretation An iron staircase in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Falling on an iron staircase in a dream. It is one of the dreams that indicate that the dreamer will suffer a great loss of friends and will lose many of those close to him in life and face many problems. Breaking the iron ladder in our dreams is evidence that the dreamer will face problems, but if he falls to the ground from the ladder after breaking it, this is a sign of death. Taking a broken ladder in a dream, and the dreamer repairing it in the dream, is evidence of recovery from illness and reforming his affairs after their corruption, thus achieving goodness. The dreamer standing on the top of the stairs in the dream is evidence of the presence of many intruders who seek to know the secrets of others and the secrets of others.

An iron ladder in a dream. One of the relatively strange dreams that we see in our dreams and they carry for us many important meanings and associations that every person must know correctly, as iron stairs are among the things that abound in our homes in order to obtain complete safety through these, and there are many different shapes and colors. Where we will explain to you the interpretation of seeing the iron gate as interpreted by the famous translator Ibn Sirin in his interpretations. Interpretation of the iron staircase in a dream: A wooden or metal ladder is a means that a person uses to climb places that do not contain stairs or that cannot be climbed easily, or to repair the house from the inside up to its roof. And its high walls. Sick health for men and women, whether they are married, married or separated in a dream. A wooden ladder in a dream indicates the holder of position, power and status, but he is a hypocrite and deceiver or unjust and unjust. It also indicates position and travel or health, prosperity and illness. Whoever sees himself climbing a wooden or metal ladder, this indicates However, he built a house or built a house, and it is said that whoever is looking for work in his life, his vision of climbing a wooden ladder indicates the help of a hypocrite. Or an unjust person or a tyrant in a high position, or a deceiver and a hypocrite. As for someone who goes up to look at the top of the stairs, this indicates travel, but if he goes up to hear the voice of people or them talking, or see their homes or secrets, or he is a spy and astonished, whether he knows it or not, permission. It indicates that he will be promoted at work and he will obtain position, honor, and money. Whoever sees himself standing at the top of the stairs, this indicates that he is a person who follows his curiosity to eavesdrop and listen to conversations from people that do not interest him, or he listens to spy on others in order to benefit from it. Or obtaining an interest without his right, and seeing a ladder lying on the ground means illness and brokenness. title: Interpretation of a chair in a dream for a single, pregnant, married and engaged girl

preview.html: Seeing one chair for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, either a white chair, a death chair, a plastic chair, a wheelchair by Ibn Sirin, and many others. Interpretation of a chair in one dream If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is sitting on a wooden or iron chair, this portends With a short marriage. The chair here symbolizes marriage or engagement. If the chair is made of gold or resembles a throne, it is an indication of religion, purity, nobility, or nobility. Interpretation of a chair in a dream for a married woman: A chair in a married woman’s dream symbolizes stability, and sitting on it is a blessing from the husband. Buying a seat in a dream may indicate a new home in a married woman’s dream. If the chair is made of gold or silver, this means that pregnancy is near. Interpretation of a chair in a pregnant woman’s dream. The chair in a pregnant woman’s dream symbolizes the midwife and in the dream it is an imminent birth. If it is made of iron, it shows a male child. Interpretation of sitting on a chair in a dream. Sitting on a chair or A sofa has a similar interpretation to sitting on a bed or bed, which indicates a person's marriage, and sitting on a golden chair is said to indicate closeness to a ruler or scholar. Sitting generally refers to height and length if the chair is high or long. Explanation of sitting on a plastic chair. Sitting on a white plastic chair in a dream indicates an unstable financial situation or an inappropriate decision in matters related to work, earnings, or livelihood. Interpretation of falling or falling from a chair in a dream. Falling Of a chair in a dream indicates failure, disappointment, laziness and laziness, as well as weakness and inability to achieve balance and satisfy desires. Interpretation of many chairs in a dream: Many chairs in a man’s dream indicate his multiple marriages or the diversity of his profession and abilities. Many chairs appear in an unmarried woman’s dream. Multiple words. Interpretation of a white chair in a dream. A white chair in a dream, not made of rubber or plastic, denotes honor, purity, immunity, dignity, high status, sublime, sublime, first positions, and concepts similar to victory, triumph, and success. Interpretation of the death chair in a dream. The execution seat. Or death in a dream is not worthy of praise and is a sign of failure, damage, or failure, and may indicate the bankruptcy of the merchant or failure of the student. The confessional chair or lie detector in a dream. The sectarian chair and lie detector in a dream indicate litigation or standing before justice, and the electric torture chair indicates a matter. It involves litigation or accusation. Interpretation of a wheelchair in a dream: The wheelchair in a dream symbolizes the inability to find a stable life and a symbol of moving from one job to another. Interpretation of beds and chairs in a dream: As for beds and chairs, whoever sees that he is in an unknown bed and there is a mattress in it, then if the king meets him, he will win it. Otherwise, he will sit on a high chair or marry a woman on this basis. On the chair and its appearance, and it was said that if she were pregnant, she would give birth to a boy, and it was said that she would die witnessing it. Interpretation of the chair in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin said: The chair is in reality.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing King Salman in a dream

preview.html: Learn about the interpretation of seeing King Salman in a dream for different occasions. Dreams represent a group of visual situations or fantasies that come to a person's mind at night during their sleep, which many believe hold many secrets for their future, so they seek to interpret them to find out what the future holds for them. Days in matters that are a good harbinger or a harbinger. Therefore, in the following article, we show you the interpretation of seeing King Salman bin Abdulaziz, ruler of the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, in detail from the encyclopedia website, so please follow us. Interpretation of the dream of seeing King Salman in a dream. Dream interpreters have shown that seeing the king in a dream indicates A high position and promising circumstances in the future for the dreamer, and this vision tells him that God will grant him success in achieving his dreams and achieving his goals in Zoe. Also, seeing someone in a dream turning into a king or crown prince in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia means that his situation will change for the better. If one sees that He became a king, but in a different country than his country of residence, then this is a sign of his final journey and the improvement of his future conditions in that country. But if he sees in a dream being removed from his position or excluded from the position of king or heir, then this is a sign that he will suffer a financial loss or lose his job, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing the king in a dream for a single woman: Seeing kings and princes in one’s dreams indicates their success in life and the fulfillment of their dreams in professional life, studies, and emotional and social life. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that King Salman is looking at her while smiling, this is good skin with a handsome man suggesting that He asks for her hand in marriage, as this vision foretells her good and abundant sustenance in the next life. Also, in a single woman’s vision of King Salman, he gives her one of the most expensive gifts, which is a sign of a lot of sustenance or that she will soon obtain a prestigious job opportunity. If this gift is precious jewelry or gold, then this vision indicates her marriage in the near future to a man. Good in religion and morals, God willing. Interpretation of seeing the king in a dream for a pregnant woman: Seeing a pregnant woman sleeping in the presence of the Custodian of the Two Holy Mosques indicates that her birth will be easy and smooth, and God will grant her success in her healthy birth and wellness, God willing. Also, if the pregnant woman sees in her dream that the Saudi Crown Prince He smiles at her, as this vision will be a good sign that she will give birth to a male child who will have great importance in the future, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about seeing the king for a married woman: A married woman’s dream of the king of the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia indicates the high status that her husband enjoys. This vision also indicates that A married woman will enjoy a stable and calm married life and the presence of warm feelings of love that unite her with her husband. In addition, seeing the caliph in a married woman’s dream may indicate that the circumstances of her husband or eldest son will improve professionally. Interpretation of a dream about seeing the king and sitting with him by Ibn SirinWhoever sees in a dream that The Custodian of the Two Holy Mosques sits with him as if he were a close friend and tries to woo him, so this is a good vision

title: Interpretation of field in a dream

preview.html: The interpretation of the field in a dream is considered one of the beautiful interpretations and contains elements that comfort the soul and make it hope that the goodness it contains will come true. Many interpretations have been reported for following the vision of the field or the presence of the dreamer in it, and they depended on the state of the field as well as the social status of the pioneer. In order for our website to provide everything new in the world of interpretations, we present to you this article that explains the interpretation that applies to the nature of the dream, Follow us. Interpretation of the field in a dream. One of the most prominent interpretations associated with seeing a field with a large expanse of green color is that it is a sign of goodness and justice in the life of this world and the hereafter, and God knows best, as it indicates Paradise and the goodness that is in it. Whoever sees that he enters the field and collects fruits and fruits from it, it is considered a sign of easing circumstances. The ease of what makes the dreamer sad and tired, especially if the dreamer takes the fruit and eats it. Seeing the field also shows the dreamer’s need for persistence and perseverance to achieve what he aspires to, and it promises him that he will reach it as soon as he makes the effort that helps him achieve it. Whoever dreams in his dream that someone is trying to cut the leaves of trees or plants, this is a sign of the illness of a family member or that there is Whoever tries to harm the person seeing him or her, and God knows best. While if the dreamer sees tree leaves falling in his field, this is evidence of the misfortunes and problems he may face if he does not pay attention to those around him. It has been said that an unmarried woman’s dream of living in an unknown field is a sign of goodness and blessing, and this happens if the orchard is full of trees and flowers, It indicates a change in her condition and life for the better. Scientists have interpreted it as a sign of entering into a married life with a man characterized by fun and high morals. Meanings of the field in dreams by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin relied on the interpretation of the field as a symbol of goodness and happiness in the life of the dreamer, and whoever dreams of it in his dream That he walks in the field and is happy and feels psychologically comfortable, this expresses goodness for him. And circumstances and relief from his worries soon, and God knows best. Ibn Sirin also interpreted it as a sign of the mercy of God Almighty and that the dreamer has a good relationship with his religion and his Creator. In other connotations, it was said that the dreamer rejoices in the goodness of this dream, as it shows the money that he will acquire, and money is often found in New land or house. Ibn Sirin also mentioned that a beautiful field symbolizes the family in general. If the field is barren, this may be a sign of illness or the loss of a family member, as well as if the field has evil or evil in it, and God Almighty knows best. Interpretation of the field in an unmarried girl’s dreamBy searching for the interpretation of the field in the dream, many Interpretations regarding the unmarried girl. The interpretations are summarized as follows: The entry of an unmarried girl into a barren field is considered an undesirable sign and a warning of the emergence of problems and fears that can sow sadness and anxiety in herself. The type of problems that the girl will face has not been specified, as they may be in the workplace. You may face major family conflicts, and God knows best. Commentators believed that the scope is wide

title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about swimming for an unmarried woman, according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about swimming for a single woman: It is one of the visions that many girls search for, as this vision indicates many different connotations and interpretations, depending on what the girl saw in her dream and where she was swimming, whether it was a sea, a river, or swimming. Swimming pool. Whether this place is alone or with people, and is this place clean or dirty, let us review through this article the most important interpretations related to the interpretation of a dream about swimming for single people. Interpretation of a dream about swimming for a single woman Professional swimming for single women in a dream is considered a promising dream that carries a lot of good news in the coming days On the other hand, if an unmarried woman sees that she is swimming with great difficulty and is about to drown, this indicates the dreamer’s connection to a disabled person who is trying to make her fall into sin. Swimming for a single girl with a small child is one of the dreams that indicates a strong need for someone to stand by her side. It supports her to overcome many difficulties. If an unmarried girl sees herself in a dream swimming beautifully and without any obstacles she faces, this indicates the success of the single woman in her future life. Interpretation of a dream about swimming for a single woman by Ibn Sirin. The unmarried girl who saw in her dream that she was walking on the sea but not swimming. It is one of the good visions that describe faith and closeness to her Lord. Swimming in a person’s dream indicates a feeling of extreme loneliness, but he will get rid of this feeling and communicate with a person who is happy with his solitude and enjoys a good way. Seeing an unmarried woman swimming in the winter and feeling tired and exhausted is a sign The dreamer’s health condition is deteriorating and she is going through a period of extreme fatigue. Seeing an unmarried woman swimming in the sea in a dream while running fast is evidence of her ability to achieve her dreams and rise to the highest levels of society. An unmarried woman swimming in a wide sea and finding gold and pearls in a dream is an indication However, the dreamer will find a new job from which he will earn a lot of money. The Dream Interpretation Site on the Internet is a site specialized in dream interpretation in the Arab world, just write. The Dream Interpretation Site on the Internet. Search on Google and get the correct interpretations. Interpretation of Dreams of Individuals Swimming in the PoolSeeing an unmarried woman swimming In the pool and being able to dive and move from the beginning of the pool to the end is a sign that the dreamer will achieve his goals. If an unmarried woman sees that she is swimming with someone she knows in the pool, this indicates that this girl is entering into an emotional relationship and that the date of her marriage to this person is approaching. However, if a girl sees that she is swimming in dirty pool water with many insects in it, this is evidence that she has entered into a failed romantic relationship that will not end in marriage, or that she is resorting to some things that God Almighty may see to it.
